data.name: SEUM: Speedrunners from Hell - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
SEUM: Speedrunners from Hell - Soundtrack is the official soundtrack which includes a collection of 10 headbanging tracks from the game, composed and specially remixed by Ivan Spelljack Jitz from the band Undercode. Jitz is one of the authors of great Serious Sam's soundtracks. It will make you rampage through the levels with blazing speed. \m/

TRACK LIST:
01 - Welcome - Soundtrack version
02 - Escape from SEUM
03 - Broken Bridge
04 - Riddle
05 - Rush
06 - Trapped in SEUM (morse code song)
07 - Vortex
08 - The Machine
09 - Vengeance
10 - Untitled Dance
11 - The Edge of Space (The Drunk Side of the Moon DLC)

NOTE: SEUM Soundtrack - All songs are presented in OGG, AAC, FLAC and WMA formats and placed in your SEUM folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\SEUM Speedrunners from Hell\SEUM Speedrunners from Hell - Soundtrack\ (OGG\, AAC\, FLAC\ and WMA\)
